<!-- docs:child of bal-navbar -->

# Navbar Menu

`bal-navbar-menu` is a child component of `bal-navbar` that defines the area in the navbar where links and actions are.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Methods

### `toggle(isMenuActive: boolean) => Promise<void>`

*Internal* - If the menu is open it closes it and the other way around.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
